summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4088 for the improvement of 44th Avenue Southwest, form West Spokane Street to West Hinds Street; by constructing watermains together with fire hydrants and the necessary appurtenances; and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 49120, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
